arguments.value: Ownable: caller is not the owner
Ownable: new owner is the zero a

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @title This contract enables you to create pausable mechanism to stop in case of emergency.
@notice Verifies whether the contract is not paused.
@notice Verifies whether the contract is paused.
@notice Unpauses the contract and returns to normal state.
@title This contract enables you to create pausable mechanism to stop in case of emergency.
@notice Verifies whether the contract is not paused.
@notice Verifies whether the contract is paused.
@notice Unpauses the contract and returns to normal state.

params._address: The address to add to the administrator list.

params._accounts: The wallet addresses to add to the administrator list.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._address: The address to remove from the administrator list.

params._accounts: The wallet addresses to add to the administrator list.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: This contract enables you to create pausable mechanism to stop in case of emergency.

addAdmin(address).notice: Adds the specified address to the list of administrators.

addManyAdmins(address[]).notice: Adds multiple addresses to the administrator list.

removeAdmin(address).notice: Removes the specified address from the list of administrators.

removeManyAdmins(address[]).notice: Removes multiple addresses to the administrator list.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract and returns to normal state.
